holidays.title: National Do Something Nice Day
holidays.description: This holiday encourages us to perform acts of kindness for strangers or loved ones — or both!

holidays.title: World Teachers' Day
holidays.description: Matilda had Ms. Honey, Harry had Dumbledore, and Cady had Ms. Norbury!

holidays.title: Yom Kippur
holidays.description: Otherwise known as the Day of Atonement, Yom Kippur is considered the holiest day in Judaism.

holidays.title: Coffee with a Cop Day
holidays.description: Get your cup ready and go to the nearest restaurant to drink coffee with a cop.

holidays.title: Dashain
holidays.description: Let us celebrate this time of year when families come together and extend kindness to others.

holidays.title: International Walk to School Day

holidays.title: Janmostav of Srimatna Sankardev
holidays.description: Honor the legacy and spirit of the founder of Assamese culture and be inspired.

holidays.title: Kiribati: Education Day
holidays.description: We are celebrating a national priority, with a day that honors teachers and everything education.

holidays.title: National Above the Bus Day
holidays.description: In this dog-eat-dog world, let no kind act go unseen and unrewarded.

holidays.title: National Apple Betty Day
holidays.description: Tart apples fresh off the tree are almost begging to be used for this autumn treat.

holidays.title: National Be Nice Day
holidays.description: Commit to walking in the light of positivity all day long.

holidays.title: National Caribbean Civility Day
holidays.description: Support the true leaders of Caribbean communities by celebrating their achievements in humanitarian work.

holidays.title: National Get Funky Day
holidays.description: We're not talking funk as in depressing, but funk as in get-happy-and-celebrate-life!

holidays.title: National Kale Day

holidays.title: National Walk and Bike to School Day
holidays.description: You've probably heard stories of how your parents or grandparents had to walk miles to school.

holidays.title: Portugal Republic Day
holidays.description: Celebrate Portugal’s Republic Day which ushered in a new form of government in a bloodless revolution!

holidays.title: Semana Morazánica
holidays.description: Celebrate Semana Morazánic with the people of Honduras, a day established to honor Franciso Morazán.

holidays.title: Vanuatu Constitution Day
holidays.description: Thanks to its constitution, Vanuatu can finally live and govern according to its own values.

holidays.title: Vijayadashami
holidays.description: Vijaydashmi, or Dusshera is the 10th and the last day of Durga Puja.

holidays.title: World Meningitis Day
holidays.description: Let’s raise awareness and stay safe from the deadly disease Meningitis before it’s too late.
